overview:
Konstantinos supervises UX Designers, Engineers and Quality Assurance at Taptu. The team that delivered the My Taptu Apps for Apple and Android.

Prior to Taptu, he lead the Yahoo! EMEA mobile product team. His team supervised the development and launch of mobile sites for Search, Mail and IM across Europe, as well as News, Sports and Finance iPhone and Blackberry apps. Before joining Yahoo!, Konstantinos was a Product Manager at Skype taking care mainly of the Voicemail, Conferencing and Alerts platforms.

Konstantinos has spent 3 years working for Vodafone Group R&D running the Demos & Trials team and developing prototypes around VoIP, Instant Messaging and Content Adaptation over mobile networks. He holds an MSc on Mobile and Satellite Communications from University of Surrey and a Diploma in Electrical Engineering from Aristotle University of Thessaloniki, Greece.
